Name: Rumi.ai
Tagline: See what’s happening across meetings, Slack, and your tools
Description: X-Ray is the intelligence layer of Rumi’s AI meeting platform. It continuously scans your team’s meetings, conversations, and connected tools like Slack and CRMs to surface insights and updates automatically. X-Ray keeps everyone informed without the noise of endless threads, recaps, or updates.

Name: Grok 4.1
Tagline: A new standard in conversational AI
Description: Grok 4.1 is the new SOTA model from xAI, ranking #1 on the LMArena leaderboard. It features massive improvements in emotional intelligence, creative writing, and helpfulness, while also being 3x less likely to hallucinate than previous models.

Name: Typeless
Tagline: AI Voice Dictation That's Actually Intelligent
Description: Speak naturally, and Typeless will turn your words into polished messages, emails, and documents that read like you carefully typed them. Our AI understands context, fixes grammar, and adapts to your style - so you can focus on what you want to say, not how to say it.

Name: Tiny Mario
Tagline: Play the ridiculously tiny Mario ever right in your URL bar.
Description: Tiny Mario reimagines the classic Super Mario Bros as a side-scroller with a low-fi, text-rendered style in your URL bar using Braille characters.

Name: Markopolo AI
Tagline: Reach 30–40% more customers with personal outreach at scale
Description: We’ve officially shifted from our previous ad-automation tool and now, Markopolo AI delivers something entirely different. Instead of generic workflows, Markopolo AI analyzes each visitor’s real behavioral signals and generates individualized follow-ups across email, SMS, text messages and voice. The result? Customers convert at 30–40%, compared to the 10–15% industry average. No A/B testing. No manual optimization. Just LLM-powered campaigns that understand intent and adapt in real time.

Name: Super V2
Tagline: The most accurate search & workflows on company knowledge
Description: Super is the most accurate way to get answers from your company data. 2x more accurate than competitors, 40% faster than our first version, our new orchestration engine lets you find answers and build reports with data from across your org, in seconds.

Name: GoMarble AI for Meta Ads
Tagline: AI Agent for Meta Ads
Description: The AI Agent for media buyers and creative strategists that explains what changed, why, and what to do next for the Meta Ad account. Ask questions like 'Why did my CAC increase?' and get root cause analysis, recommendations AND beautiful reports in seconds — not hours.

Name: Thumbmagic
Tagline: Generate viral YouTube & Reels thumbnails with AI
Description: AI-powered thumbnail generator for YouTube & Reels. Create, personalize, and edit thumbnails designed to drive more clicks and views, trusted by thousands of creators.

Name: Querri 2.0
Tagline: Natural‑language data analysis with instant visuals
Description: Querri transforms how teams work with data, making it easy to connect, clean, analyze, and visualize - all in one place. With new integrations and interactive, drag-and-drop dashboards, anyone can now build automated workflows and shareable insights - no technical expertise required

Name: WeatherNext 2 by Google DeepMind
Tagline: Google's most advanced and efficient forecasting model
Description: WeatherNext 2 is Google DeepMind’s most advanced AI weather model, delivering forecasts up to 8× faster and at hourly resolution. Using a new Functional Generative Network, it generates hundreds of realistic scenarios to better capture uncertainty and extreme events. WeatherNext 2 now powers forecasts in Search, Gemini, Pixel Weather, and Google Maps, and is available in Earth Engine, BigQuery, and Vertex AI.

Name: AI Email Template Generator
Tagline: Instantly create and edit emails by chatting with AI
Description: If you can describe your idea, you can now design emails. Mailmodo AI creates complete email templates from a single prompt and lets you edit them through conversation. It's fast, accurate, and built for teams who want to ship campaigns faster.

Name: Jotform Enterprise 2.0
Tagline: AI-powered no-code form platform for your team
Description: Jotform Enterprise 2.0 centralizes enterprise management with a new Admin Console, cross-product analytics, and customizable workspaces, giving organizations complete control over users, forms, and data in one secure, unified platform.

Name: Nitpicks
Tagline: Automatically fix UI/UX bugs from screen recordings
Description: Nitpicks allows you to record and fix UI/UX bugs directly while using your application. Simply open the extension, click on record, and show the bug while naturally explaining it (by talking). Nitpicks sends a GitHub pull request with the fix automatically. You can also request app changes, not necessarily a bug fix. Just explain it on the video and get it done. Finally, you can also select and annotate specific UI elements for small adjustments and get a pull request with them implemented.

Name: Heartbeat Hero
Tagline: Easy CPR training & simulation using only an iPhone
Description: Heartbeat Hero is created to allow anyone to learn CPR quickly, then practise until it sticks. Heartbeat Hero gives you real-time, accurate feedback on rhythm and depth so you can perform effective chest compressions with confidence. All lessons and practice work fully offline, and an advanced AI 999 call simulator helps you rehearse what to say in an emergency, something many people struggle with. Furthermore, the app always opens with what3words and live location for real emergency situations

Name: Baserow 2.0
Tagline: Build databases, automations, apps & agents with AI, no code
Description: Baserow 2.0 is the new AI-powered data collaboration platform to build databases, workflows, automations, AI agents, and applications — all without coding. Now with an AI Assistant to vibe no-code any data-driven process! It is open-source and available in our cloud or as a self-hosted deployment, so you stay in control of your data.

Name: Gram Functions
Tagline: Define agent tools in TypeScript & deploy as MCP servers
Topics: Software Engineering, Developer Tools, Artificial Intelligence, GitHub
Description: Gram Functions is a simple TypeScript framework that lets you define AI agent tools in code and deploy them as MCP servers to the Gram platform. No protocol knowledge or infrastructure management required. npm create @gram-ai/function

Name: InsForge
Tagline: The backend for AI-assisted Development
Topics: Open Source, Developer Tools, GitHub, Database
Description: InsForge is the backend built for AI-assisted development. Connect InsForge with any agent. Add authentication, database, storage, functions, and AI integrations to your app in seconds.

Name: Unravel
Tagline: See YOUR mind as a network
Description: Your mind is a network. Now you can see it. Simply talk. It automatically builds a living map of your mind—a visual network of your beliefs, thoughts, desires and much more. Watch it grow as you speak. Then uncover the pattern holding you back—and reshape it. Unravel your mind. Understand it. Change it.

Name: webhook.rodeo
Tagline: Wrangle webhooks like a cowboy
Description: Webhook Rodeo is a webhook debugging and delivery platform designed for developers who want clarity and control. It gives you a dedicated endpoint for receiving, inspecting, and forwarding webhooks that's always on and reliable, so you never miss a webhook again.

Name: Poe
Tagline: Introducing group chat for all poe users
Description: Poe's new group chat let's you chat with people you know and any AI (GPT-5, Claude Sonnet 4.5, Nano Banana, etc.) in one conversation
